onlineObj.heading: Mobile Point-of-Sale
onlineObj.para: Providers can create invoices and charge patients right in the room. Once you load your inventory, prices, and discounts into Aesthetic Record, it takes less than a minute to check-out. Our POS provides you with advanced sales and inventory reporting, so you know important metrics in real-time.
onlineObj.notes: No Credit Card Required, 14 Day Free Trial
